messages.message: Really nit-picking: I’m building an app with a few fields and descriptions, I wonder if others are finding this distracting too - when these two buttons area it makes the fields move up and down.
cc: @Serena @alagu  what is Design opinion here

thanks for the feedback - it is jumpy. cc: @Natasha @Jianqi Xing

maybe we can consider built in space so there is no jump even if run button appears only when applicable.
can also consider keeping the buttons but disabling them...will take a look
I thought we did consider that? There was some rationale not to do that - I can’t remember
